
```{r}
user_info_df <- import_multiple_files("user_info.csv", import_user_info)
# Note: your file paths and data may look slightly different.
user_info_df %>%
  mutate(
    user_id = str_extract(
      file_path_id,
      "user_[1-9][0-9]?"
    ),
    .before = everything()
  ) %>%
  select(-file_path_id)
```
